Title: S7 Ep. 307 Michelle Sanabria & Caleigh Hoyne - The Ladies In Pink Are Back
Description:
306 Michelle Sanabria and Caleigh Hoyne - The Ladies In Pink Are Back! 

 

In case you do not know these two ladies, their episode from 2023 DOMINATED audio and YouTube streaming channels. Michelle Sanabria is the founder/owner of SMS Events and Caleigh Hoyne is the Ops Manager. These ladies in pink are THE event gurus you should hire to make every event an experience that is memorable. 

 

They won first place for the most downloads in 2023 AND first place for the most YouTube views in 2023. Their show is S6 Ep. 276 Michelle Sanbria and Caleigh Hoyne - When Structure + Ambition = Big Dreams.  Check it out on Employers 4 Change YouTube channel. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tyMDs4iB-ys

 

These two powerhouse leaders dominate the Events industry AND have fun. Expect them to share more tips about what their industry looks like in the future, cooking recipes and conference highlights as are back a second time to make you all smile. 

Three take aways from this episode:

  • How does singing songs at work improve productivity?
  • What nonprofit do they want to partner with? Hint, it has to do with the color pink
  • What does AI look like with AI moving into 2030?

We hope you enjoy this week's episode of The Intern Whisperer brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing #Skills #DiversityEquityInclusion #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike. 

Apply today to be an #Employer4Change that invests in #intern #talent and #employees.
